### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    medication_name VARCHAR(255),
    dosage_mg INT,
    dosage_frequency VARCHAR(50)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE prescriptions SET dosage_mg = 500 WHERE prescription_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
	prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
	medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	dosage FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE medication_info (
	medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
	quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE prescriptions SET dosage=10 WHERE prescription_id='12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
